Seth Greco

Hello, I am a full-stack webdevleoper in the making. I am a recently graduated from UTSA (University of Texas at San Antonio) in 2019 with a degree in Computer Science. My studies focused mainly on software engineering and using languages such as Python and C. Through different ideas & solo projects I found web-development to be very enjoyable and a good challenge for me to undertake. Starting with Django and developing back-end apis I branched into learning HTML, CSS, Javascript, Mysql, Mongo and other web related technologies to make a robust skillset.
